query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Sustainability and business model
result.description: This deliverable presents the suggested sustainability model, and the related business model for VRE use. This model will be tested in the last open call, via milestones M6.6 and M6.7.

result.title: Inventory of data sources
result.description: "The deliverable ""inventory of data sources"" is referring to task 1.1 of WP1. The inventory will include at least 70 European projects, 250 national projects and 500 additional sources and will be used for the selection of the industrial crops (Task 1.3) for feeding the MAGIC-CROPS database that will be developed in task 1.2 as well as will be used for the compilation of the handbook on industrial crops (deliverable 1.5)."

result.title: Handbook with fact sheets of the existing resource-efficient industrial crops
result.description: This deliverable is one of the outcomes of task 1.1 (Inventory of the data sources on industrial crops). The handbook will include information on existing resource-efficient industrial crops (those that will be included in MAGIC-CROPS) in the form of fact sheets with concrete, comprehensive and up-date information per crop and will be uploaded in the project website.
